input.sentences: while walking in the woods we saw a lot of cob webs .
look at the nasty spider on the leaf .
there is another type of spider coming down on a web .
we were waiting to get on the subway .
what an awesome creation of a pyramid | very unique .
output.sentences: I was walking in the woods and ran into spider webs.
There was a nasty looking spider on the leaf.
This type of spider spins a large web.
I decided to head to the subway to wait for the train.
Outside the subway was a unique pyramid creation.
